com.communote.server.web.api.service.post.convert

Class ApiNoteConverter<T extends SimpleNoteListItem,O extends PostListItem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.vo.query.QueryResultConverter<T,O>
      • com.communote.server.web.api.service.post.convert.ApiNoteConverter<T,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The SimpleNoteListItem which is the incoming list
    O - The PostListItem which is the final list
    Deprecated. 
    Use new generated REST-API instead

    @Deprecated
public class ApiNoteConverter<T extends SimpleNoteListItem,O extends PostListItem>
extends QueryResultConverter<T,O>
    ApiNoteConverter to convert the temporary object into a PostListItem Note: this converter is not thread-safe
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
